page.title: 11A day at the village school
page.content: The bus brings us all to school,except for the ones that live in the village, they walk to school. We all go into the cloak-room to hang our bags in, then we all go out to play for about ten minutes. Someone then rings the bell, that means that we all have to go in.We usually have Assembly then. After that we go into the classroom.We all read for a while untill the teacher calls out 'TIME-TABLE!' We are all split up into four groups, A,B,C, and D. Each group has to look on their chart to see what they have to do. They get on with the first thing on their chart. By the time they have finished their first thing, it is playtime. The teacher shouts out 'PLAYTIME'. Two girls sell crisps. and we all go out to play. We stay out for about 15 minutes. The bell goes again, we all come in.
